original_text: So that the man that is tender among you, and very delicate, his eye shall be evil toward his brother, and toward the wife of his bosom, and toward the remnant of his children which he shall leave:
korean_text: 너희 중에 온유하고 연약한 남자까지도 그의 형제와 그의 품의 아내와 그의 남은 자녀를 미운 눈으로 바라보며

sentences.original_text: So that the man that is tender among you
his eye shall be evil toward his brother
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 눈이 그의 형제에게 악하게 될 것이며

sentences.original_text: and toward the wife of his bosom
and toward the remnant of his children
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 자녀 중 남은 자들에게도 그러할 것이며
